title: The Visual Dictionary of Animals
description: Come explore animals from the inside out! This visual dictionary looks at the inner workings of elephants, dolphins, sharks, spiders, cats, bears, butterflies, birds, crabs, kangaroos, and much more. Open these pages and find: Over 200 outstanding original photographs and graphic illustrations.Exploded views and cutaway photographs that reveal even the tiniest parts of animal anatomy.A fascinating new kind of dictionary that can be used by the entire family.Concise text and carefully researched definitions that are user-friendly for people of all ages.Instant access to a 3000-word specialist vocabulary.
author: Clare Shedden
